Sentencas: Auxiliary power units (APUs) provide electrical power, with favourable efficiency and independent of the drive system, for a variety of mobile applications.
Titulo: Assessment of the application of fuel cell APUs and starter-generators to reduce automobile fuel consumption

Sentencas: The demand for electricity increases with increasing demand for convenience and safety functions, as well as for control and regulation services.
Titulo: Assessment of the application of fuel cell APUs and starter-generators to reduce automobile fuel consumption

Sentencas: Examples of these functions are engine-independent air conditioning in motor vehicles or by-wire technologies in aircraft.
Titulo: Assessment of the application of fuel cell APUs and starter-generators to reduce automobile fuel consumption

Sentencas: The additional power must be provided with the greatest possible efficiency, due to the general requirement for an overall reduction in fuel consumption.
Titulo: Assessment of the application of fuel cell APUs and starter-generators to reduce automobile fuel consumption

Sentencas: This contribution compares the present status of on-board electricity supply in conventional passenger cars with variants, based on the starter-generator and the auxiliary power unit (APU).
Titulo: Assessment of the application of fuel cell APUs and starter-generators to reduce automobile fuel consumption

Sentencas: The results of a process engineering analysis define the potential efficiency of electricity generation with solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) based systems.
Titulo: Assessment of the application of fuel cell APUs and starter-generators to reduce automobile fuel consumption

Sentencas: In addition to the load profiles of the auxiliaries, the driving cycle must be defined within the framework of a model-based dynamic drive train simulation, in order to finally determine the fuel consumption per kilometre in dynamic operation.
Titulo: Assessment of the application of fuel cell APUs and starter-generators to reduce automobile fuel consumption

Sentencas: As a result, the fuel consumption of the variants investigated is presented and the possibilities for applying fuel cell APUs and starter-generators assessed.
